what are the differences between megatag1 and megatag2? is it big?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2025-03-24T18:49:24.493Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":19,"reads":111,"readers_count":110,"score":117.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":496760,"topic_slug":"megatag1-vs-megatag2","display_username":"Ertu","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":74317,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/megatag1-vs-megatag2/496760/1","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3567208,"name":"Scott W","username":"Programming4907","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/programming4907/{size}/168313_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-24T18:52:35.393Z","cooked":"

The primary difference is that with MT2 you have to provide the Limelight with your (blue relative) gyro heading.

This allows the MT2 algorithm to differentiate between otherwise ambiguous poses, such as when the camera is almost straight in front of a tag.

The caveat is that it becomes dependent on your gyro heading, and will give you very incorrect poses if your gyro heading is incorrect.

Introducing MegaTag2 by Limelight Vision General Forum
MegaTag2: Setting a New Standard in Robot Localization Limelight MegaTag2 is an easy-to-use, trustworthy, and ambiguity-free robot localizer. Here are its key improvements over MegaTag1: Ambiguity-Free Localization With MegaTag2, we have eliminated the pose ambiguity problem and significantly increased robustness against image/corner noise. Superior Pose Estimation No matter the perspective, MegaTag2 provides excellent estimates given one or multiple tags. Robust Against Physical Inaccuracies …
